thread.title: This Company Lets Employees Rate Their Bosses Twice a Year

author: Vanessa Fuhrmans
title: This Company Lets Employees Rate Their Bosses Twice a Year
text:
Companies track everything from worker productivity to inventory fluctuations. Yet relatively few systematically measure the relationship between employees and their managers.
As low unemployment heightens pressure on companies to hang on to top talent, though, one tech firmâ€™s effort to do just that highlights the difference a good boss can make.
